title: ‘You Signed Up for This’: Mike Woods Confronts the Hard Truths of Being a Privateer
content:
Mike Woods takes on Santa Vall, his first race since retiring from the WorldTour, and discovers some brutal truths about life and racing when you have to do everything yourself.

Read the full article at ‘You Signed Up for This’: Mike Woods Confronts the Hard Truths of Being a Privateer on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
